extendedInfo.description: Sticky Note is a simple but useful application that can display a sticky note of your choice when turning back on the screen of your mobile device.It is very practical when users also set a device password or a screen lock as the sticky note is able to be displayed on top. This removes the need to enter the password for non sensible information such as shopping lists :)

reviews.title: Good at its job!
reviews.comment: No fancy graphics but the feature I was looking for is there.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great
reviews.comment: Nice app. Thanks for small size and no additional permission. Is it possible to change font size.
reviews.author: Kiran Kadali
